Body: We fully explored possible competitors. SNIP is an unsuccessful copy of the project that has been working for a long time in the countries of Asia. The project is called "The Headlines", the essence of which is the collection of headlines of current news, and then the AI analyzes your cookies and selects news for you based on your preferences. The original project is quite successful - about a thousand employees and capitalization of $ 15 billion. Today there are no analogues in the world of what our team has implemented. All the news, not just the headlines, is broadcasted on theworldnews.net, and the hash is written to the blockchain. You don’t need to attend any other resources that you read every day. You can choose those that you are interested in and read only it in live on our website. Over the period of 3 weeks that the alpha version works in 200 countries we already stored more information than, for example, Fox News over the period of 21 years. In 6 months we will be the largest repository of news content in the history of Mankind. And this is in the blockchain. Reliability of news, user-friendliness, and transparency to investors is what will allow us to become the World’s leader by number of non-editable information - so I can describe our vision of the future Project for the next 5 years). The number of users that equals 1.4 million+ for the last month and 770k thousand+ for the last week(https://ibb.co/ggG6Gb) and daily growth without advertising and marketing show that everything is comfortable enough even in alpha version and we’re gonna be great).
